sentences: Aage Stentoft (1 May 1914 – 8 July 1990) was a Danish composer, film score composer and theatre director.
In 1934, he began working as an accompanist and composer for the revue troupe Co-Optimisterne.
In 1961, Aage Stentoft emigrated to Spain.
In 1973, he returned to Denmark as leader of the Tivoli Gardens theatre, a job he kept until his retirement in 1981, after which he returned to Spain.
He died at his home near Málaga in 1990.
